title: System Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Leadership Development for Business Model Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core concepts and implementation processes of Business Model Innovation (BMI)
Learners can analyze the correlation between BMI and leadership competencies using SEM-based research methodologies
Learners can explain the impact of exploratory/exploitative learning strategies on BMI by applying organizational case studies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
